Package tools

Class InputPreprocessor

java.lang.Object
tools.InputPreprocessor
public final class InputPreprocessor
extends java.lang.Object
Comprises static methods to generate sets of ReferenceAnalysisEntry and SampleAnalysisEntry instances.

Each ReferenceAnalysisEntry defines one genomic location for downstream analysis: These may comprise single genes on different chromosomes or plasmids, contigs or full genomes.

Each SampleAnalysisEntry defines a input sample by specifying the sample name and input `.vcf` file VCFFileReader.

Since:
2.0
Version:
2.0
Author:
Simon Hackl

  • Method Details

    • preprocessReferenceInput

      public static java.util.HashSet<ReferenceAnalysisEntry> preprocessReferenceInput​(ArgumentsParser arguments) throws java.io.IOException
      Preprocesses the specified reference `.fasta` file.
      Parameters:
      arguments - ArgumentsParser storing arguments parsed from the command line.
      Returns:
      A HashSet of ReferenceAnalysisEntry instances.
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - If any access to the reference `.fasta` file failed.

    • preprocessSampleInput

      public static java.util.concurrent.CopyOnWriteArraySet<SampleAnalysisEntry> preprocessSampleInput​(ArgumentsParser arguments) throws java.lang.InterruptedException
      Preprocesses the specified samples `.vcf` file.
      Parameters:
      arguments - ArgumentsParser storing arguments parsed from the command line.
      Returns:
      A thread safe CopyOnWriteArraySet of SampleAnalysisEntry instances.
      Throws:
      java.lang.InterruptedException - If the process was interrupted.

    • adjustFastaHeader

      private static java.lang.String adjustFastaHeader​(java.lang.String header)
      Adjusts a fasta entry header in such a way that no symbols that are not allowed for file names are contained anymore.
      Returns:
      A adjusted fasta header than can be used safely as filename.
